channel.title: GitHub Vala Weekly Trending
channel.description: Weekly Trending of Vala in GitHub

item.title: frida/frida-core
item.description: Frida core library intended for static linking into bindings

item.title: Aylur/astal
item.description: Building blocks for creating custom desktop shells

item.title: ErikReider/SwayNotificationCenter
item.description: A simple GTK based notification daemon for any Wayland compositor

item.title: cheesecakeufo/komorebi
item.description: A beautiful and customizable wallpapers manager for Linux

item.title: phw/peek
item.description: Simple animated GIF screen recorder with an easy to use interface

item.title: alainm23/planify
item.description: Task manager with Todoist & Nextcloud support designed for GNOME
